abstract: The racecourse, now crumbling, was the site of one of the most storied road races in automotive history, the Targa Florio.
snippet: The racecourse, now crumbling, was the site of one of the most storied road races in automotive history, the Targa Florio.
lead_paragraph: CERDA, Italy - Just three miles north of this Sicilian village, on old Highway 120, there's an incongruous wide spot in the road where several crumbling buildings sit behind a wire fence intended to keep the curious and mischievous out.

headline.main: Driving the Remains of Sicily's Targa Florio Circuit
